column2: ggplot(better_gender, aes(`Manner of Death`))+geom_bar(aes(y=Age,fill=Gender), stat = "summary", fun.y="mean")+theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45,hjust = 1)) + ggtitle("Mean Ages of Various Manners of Death According to Gender") + scale_y_continuous(breaks = scales::pretty_breaks(n = 10))
